name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
schedule:
Week 1 Chap.1 Introduction to Automatic Control Systems
Week 2 Chap.2 Mathematical Background
Week 3 Chap.3 Mathematical Models of Systems
Week 4 Chap.4 Classical Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems
Week 5 Chap.5 State-Space Analysis of Control Systems
Week 6 Chap.6 Stability
Week 7 Chap.7 The Root Locus Method
Week 8 Chap.8 Frequency Domain Analysis
Week 9 (11/9)複習及(11/13)期中考試
Week 10 Chap.9 Classical Control Design Methods
Week 11 Chap.10 State-Space Design Methods
Week 12 Chap.11 Optimal Control
Week 13 Chap.12 Digital Control
Week 14 Chap.13 System Identification
Week 15 Chap.14 Adaptive Control
Week 16 Chap.15 Robust Control
Week 17 Chap.16 Fuzzy Control
Week 18 (1/11)期末考試
materials: Textbook: Modern Control Engineering, P. N. Paraskevopoulos, Marcel Dekker, 2002.
